In this lab you will learn the fundamentals of programming in R. Start by reading over the following tutorials from [STATS10 Lab 1](/ucla/stats10/labs/lab1.qmd)


The tutorial will help you get started with 

1. [Fundamentals of R](/ucla/stats10/fundamentals.qmd)
2. [Importing Data in R](/ucla/stats10/importing_data.qmd)
3. [Summarizing and Visualzing Numerical Data](/ucla/stats10/intro_numerical_variables.qmd)
4. [Summarizing and Visualzing Categorical Data](/ucla/stats10/intro_categorical_variables.qmd)
